Description: Up for sale is this Vintage Schecter Ultra 3 Diamond Series Ivory Pearl Electric Guitar serial # 0621254 made in South Korea it is being sold fro parts or to restore, guitar is being sold as seen with No Case and Not Working, it is missing the Bixby tailpiece with whammy bar and the pick ups and tuneomatic bridge and the set nut on the input jack and the finish has some scratching on the back and some on front it has a couple chips on the edge of the body and head stock otherwise it will be easy to restore, it has a great solid one piece body and neck with a a straight neck with great rose wood finger board with pearl inlays with the original grover tuners and guitar is wired to the original switches and original sound knobs and guitar has the pick up hardware and I believe it will work with the parts added and it will sound nice, its a great project that is very collectable. This item will ship as a 7 to 8 pound package. I ship via U.S. Postal service, either priority mail , retail ground or first class whatever buyer chooses. I also sell and ship international and use Priority International and International First Class and include tracking at no cost to buyer. I combine shipping to save on shipping cost, so if you plan to bid on items days apart, please let me know so a can combine invoices. Items will be shipped less than 24 hours after receiving payment. Thank you for stopping by and please take a look at the other items I have for sale on this site for great bargains and service.
